page.title: 02Media in Stallingborough
page.content: Newspapers. There is a Newsagents Shop supplying National Daily papers, magazines and the local evening paper. Television. Coverage is by: National T.V. networks, BBC1&2, Yorkshire T.V., and Channel 4. Radio. Available are: BBC national and local stations, Viking Radio (local commercial). Video.Many homes have these. The Post Office keeps a small video library, app. 96 cassettes. Advertisements. In the Post Office window include goods to buy or sell, jobs (both private and those placed by the Grimsby Job Centre). Village Publications. A monthly Newsletter is printed by the Parish Council, every home receives one free. They also published an information booklet useful to newcomers. The Workers Education Ass. have printed a book on local history.
